hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn ‘Abbas said:“I was among the weak ones of his family (i.e., the women and children) whom the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) sent on ahead.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنْ تَقَدَّمَ مِنْ جَمْعٍ إِلَى مِنًى لِرَمْىِ الْجِمَارِ
chapter.eng-name: One who comes from Jam` to Mina to stone the pillars
